the only reason people have cs:s installed is mostly cause gmod requires its textures lol

but as a real review, I gotta say, it's CS 1.6, but in Source, with enchanced graphics and quite literally a successor of CS 1.6

The most underrated game in the series. May not have the best shooting mechanics but it definitely has the best physics. It's so fun watching the bodies fall to the ground and it has the best mods ever in a Counter Strike game. It runs really good on low spec systems! I truly love this game and you will too.
